sub_title: Engineering @ Booking.com | Prev. Engineering @ Branch International | Prev. Engineering  @ TapChief
summary:
A hacker at heart, I have been coding since ‘08 and started building products soon after. I hosted my first website on an Apache server with mod_php on one of my old laptops using  Dynamic DNS. I love talking about physics, especially the nature of reality. Like most engineers, I too suffer from intermittent episodes of the shiny ball syndrome.

When not pushing code, I enjoy a nice cup of coffee, cycling, 3D printing coasters, making cocktails and voice enabled IOT devices.

Notable Achievements

* Developed and owned the delivery of world-class products with a strong emphasis on performance, security, and a road to a good architecture
* Designed, Built, and maintained high throughput (70k+ rps) low latency (20 ms) distributed systems accessing millions of DB objects/s  with strict SLOs, monitoring, alerting & runbooks in a multi-cloud environment
* Built  and mentored an exceptional team of engineers
* Well-versed in handling cross-functional requirements at multiple early-stage startups
* Experience building multiple social networks in different domains with the mindset of achieving good defensibility and growth using network effects
* Led multiple migrations with zero down-time
* Pioneered the usage of micro-frontends in 2017


Languages/ Frameworks/Tools

AWS, Angular, Django, Heroku, Java, Javascript, Kubernetes, Microfrontends, Microservices, OAuth, PostgreSQL, Python, RabbitMQ, React, Redis, Ruby On Rails, Software Architecture Design, Websockets

* Exceptional at Web Developement, Mobile Development, Improving Engineering Efficiency, Perfromance Testing, TDD, Stakeholder negotiations, Prioritization
* Fluent with software design patterns and principles like SOLID, GRASP, OOP, 24 GOF, 12 Factor App

projects.title: Humit
projects.description:
Humit is a social network initially released on BITS Pilani Campus that lets users share snippets of the music they love. As the Co-Founder I led the design, development and deployment of the mobile app using the IONIC framework. Notable features that give us a Competetive advantage include:

1) Lightning Suggestions based on KNN - Love listening to a song ? Get Similar suggestions mmediately
2) A Playlist curated based on your living breathing Music Persona

projects.title: Computer Vision - Motion detection warning system
projects.description:
* Implemented a simple motion detection system by subtracting frames

* If the area of the contour happens to be above a certain threshold it pings the websocket on a node server which in turn broadcasts it to all connected browsers

contributors.headline: Engineering @ Booking.com | Prev. Engineering @ Branch International | Prev. Engineering  @ TapChief

profile_positions.description:
Booking.com is an Online Travel Agency on a mission to make it easier for everyone to experience the world. A large part of that is localizing the content on our website to serve an international audience. As a part of the Localization Platform, my team is responsible for maintaining the stack that delivers translated content throughout the booking ecosystem seamlessly across platforms (Web, Android, IOS, Marketing Channels).

Experience as a Localization Platform Team Member at Booking.com

•  Led a successful migration project to a different K8s cluster for a high-throughput, low-latency service that handles 60,000 translation requests per second, ensuring zero downtime and adherence to our SLO budget.

•  Successfully implemented a warmup strategy to reduce the occurrence of 5xx errors during a redeployment.

•  Designed and implemented a translation pipeline, enabling our service to scale out to 200,000 requests per second and beyond, accommodating increasing user demand and ensuring optimal performance. The pipeline utilizes cloud technologies to expand our offering to a multi-cloud environment, to allow for low-latency (p99 20ms) retrieval of translations within the same data center.

•  Fostered effective cross-functional collaboration, working closely with teams across the organization to align goals and deliver high-quality results.

•  Communicated project progress, technical details, and recommendations to stakeholders, fostering transparency and facilitating informed decision-making.
profile_positions.title: Full Stack Software Engineer II

profile_positions.description:
Branch is an American fintech that disburses loans to the financially underserved using an Android device based on mobile application usage data in both the African and Indian subcontinents. We are building a full-service digital bank!

• Optimized query performance by 20%, by migrating our data
warehouse, analytical dashboards & pipelines from Redshift to Snowflake
• Automated API regression tests to reduce manual testing effort by 30%
• Developed Wallets KYC flow in 4 weeks to ensure business continuity
• Established data modeling practices around DBT for a team of 25
• Redesigned credit service to reduce ML model deployment times by 80%
profile_positions.title: Software Engineer II

profile_positions.description:
TapChief is a 2-sided marketplace that enables business to access talent on-demand (think Uber for Talent) while empowering professionals to effectively share and monetize their skills.

As Head of the Engineering team I was responsible for a 19 member team and everything starting from Software Architecture, Hiring, Sprint restrospectives, Asynchronous Standups and 1 on 1s. 

Notable Achievements
• Pioneered the migration to a Micro-Frontend Architecture by moving stable shared modules into seperate libraries. Developed a context switching service to facilitate communications

• Orchestrated the Development of a  project management software called workspace over a period 6 months while working remotely

• Established a framework for hiring and managed the hiring of 9 interns from a pool of 1000 applicants who had applied and solved 3 challenges I had posted online. I prepped my entire team and put together 2 panels of interviewers so that we could function more efficiently

• Set up an environment to enable customer success executives to start building internal tooling on Google App Script with a Sheets DB backend, thus reducing the load on the Engineering Team

• Reduced build time by about 50%. Prevented node-sass rebuild by using the right alpine binding
profile_positions.title: Engineering Lead

profile_positions.description:
* Orchestrated the development of internal tools as the head of the Demand Engineering POD to establish good Account Management practices after sufficient primary and secondary research.

*  Wrote  TRDs to bring all the stakeholders on the same page for aligned execution

* Established Test Driven Development practices

* Developed a library that handled the restoration of RabbitMQ in the event of faliure. https://github.com/aukris/rabbit_droppings
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Engineer

profile_positions.description:
* Spearheaded everything from the market sizing, product hypothesis and development of our Whitelabel app that is currently being used by major online education platforms like upgrad, Manipal and many others...

* Oversaw the development of the TapCHief Mobile App on NativeScript with a strong emphasis on performance

* Architectured and solely executed the migration of our Chat backend to improve perfromance

* Led the development of a mobile first rich text editor called tap-rich-text which I later exposed as a custom web element

* Idiot proofed our platform against the OWASP top 10 vulnerabilities

* Built a bot using the chain of responsibility design pattern to take project requests directly from slack
profile_positions.title: Product Engineer

profile_positions.description:
As the youngest founding team member of TapChief I along with 2 other developers released the MVP in a short span of 45 days. Quickly solved the cold start issue on our platform by writing various scripts to onboard users onto our platform from various distribution channels including Linkedin without spending a single marketing $. 

*Improved page load times by 90% by moving to Angular Universal SSR
*Increased expert acquisition rate 5 X by making social bots for AngelList and LinkedIn
* Reduced the number of call drops by migrating our platform to use Twilio
*Oversaw the migration of our frontend onto Angular 2
* Improves search relevance by using Elasticsearch and Facets
* Built a profile builder, paid messaging module, telephonic consultation, Newsfeed  and various onboarding flows

profile_positions.title: Research Assistant

profile_positions.description:
The primary focus was in simplifying the operational process behind scheduling of kilns for their grinding wheel manufacturing unit. I led the development of an ERP that would let them track the order from start to finish all while utilising all the available resource.  
This led to a 12 % decrease in fuel consumption, saving the company about 18 lakhs every month
